abstract: You take one day off from the markets, and everything starts falling apart. European banks face more write-downs, the Pru deal is on the rocks, China is sending mixed signals and well, BP still hasn’t pulled its act together. That said, it’s not all bad news. Humankind has discovered new ways to order take-out — and no, it’s not the morning kind.
snippet: You take one day off from the markets, and everything starts falling apart. European banks face more write-downs, the Pru deal is on the rocks, China is sending mixed signals and well, BP still hasn’t pulled its act together. That said, it’s not a...
lead_paragraph: You take one day off from the markets, and everything starts falling apart. European banks have been warned on more write-downs, the Pru deal is on the rocks, China is sending mixed signals and, well, BP still hasn’t pulled its act together. That said, it’s not all bad news. Humankind has discovered new ways to order takeout — and no, it’s not the morning kind.
